name: Teens Get Vaccines at Newly Opened Jacobs Center Site
description: After a year of missing out on their favorite activities, San Diego teens are ready to make up for lost time. The County of San Diego is offering COVID-19 vaccinations to teenagers as young as 12 years old. Local teens jumped at the chance to talk about getting their shots and their plans once fully vaccinated.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office
